item.title: SQL Server Database Administrator @ JustAnswer (laurel hts / presidio)
item.description:
What if your DBA job could save lives? At JustAnswer, it does! We're the largest paid question and answer service; where over 20,000 Doctors, Lawyers, Veterinarians, Mechanics, and other Experts answer questions 24/7.

Have a strange headache in the middle of the night? Ask our Health Experts. Have a legal dispute with a neighbor? Ask our Legal Experts. You get the idea.

Since we're all about Questions & Answers, here are the details on this opportunity in Q&A format:

Q: What's the JustAnswer story?
A: JustAnswer is a fast growing, top 500 website (click here) started in 2003 by Internet entrepreneur Andy Kurtzig. You can learn more about how the company got started and what we do here.

Q: What's the difference between JustAnswer and the free answer sites?
A: When you ask a serious question on the free answer sites, you usually get an answer from a teenager. When you ask on JustAnswer, you get Experts. Who would you trust with your health? What about your taxes? Or, anything else that's important to you...

Q: What are the responsibilities of the job?
A: You would be responsible for the maintenance, reliability, security and performance of our database.

Q: What kind of person does JustAnswer look for in everyone they hire?
A: We look for 3 things: *Smart*, *Fun* to work with and *Gets Things Done*. A bonus if you have a lot of high volume eCommerce experience, at least 2+ years please!

Q: What do Customers think of JustAnswer?
A: Click here to see some Customer testimonials.

Q: What's the Salary?
A: Depends on your experience, but it'll be a competitive rate. And you get stock options, health and dental insurance and lots of other great perks.


Now, we've got a Question for youÂ…
Q: Nine nickels and a traditional balance are lying in front of you. All nickels have the same weight except for one counterfeit, which is slightly heavier than the others. What is the minimum number of times you expect to use the balance to guarantee you've found the counterfeit nickel? Please explain the process you would take. Bonus points if you do so programmatically!


Make a difference in the world! Apply to join JustAnswer now by sending us the answer to the riddle and your resume. See you soon.
